data.title: Investments - Rivean Capital
data.text:
Wilvo Group

Wilvo Group is a leading provider of precision engineered metal components, assemblies and transportation systems to high-tech OEMs in attractive, fast-growing end-markets including semiconductor equipment, industrial automation, medtech, textile, and packaging. Wilvo is recognized as highly reliable production partner focusing on high-mix, low volume series having a long-standing (average c. 20 years) and recurring customer base (c. 98%) with single source relationships (c. 99%) on the back of customer intimacy and co-engineering relationships. Wilvo employs c. 520 FTE and is headquartered in Bergeijk, the Netherlands.

Read More

Dataciders

Dataciders is a leading IT services group offering end-to-end (“E2E”) data and analytics (“D&A”) solutions, primarily serving long-standing enterprise customers incl. DAX40 companies. The group’s E2E D&A capabilities cover data strategy, enterprise application integration, software engineering, data management, business intelligence and analytics, as well as data science and AI. Headquartered in Dortmund (Germany), Dataciders employs more than 500 FTEs across seven locations in Germany and one nearshoring location in Sofia (Bulgaria).

Read More

Green Mobility Holding

Green Mobility Holding is one of Europe’s leading technology-based (e-)bike leasing groups, providing bike leasing services to companies and their employees. With its different brands, Green Mobility Holding ensures an all-encompassing carefree service by providing corporate customers with a tailored company bike portal for the selection of (e-)bikes, as well as a proprietary service network. Green Mobility Holding is headquartered in Munich, Germany, and employs more than 200 employees across over 10 locations.

Read More

CED

CED is a pan-European leader in expert advice and claims management services, serving the insurance industry as well as the (semi-public) sector. Over the years, the Company has diversified its profile, being active across the claims value chain, in the property, mobility and vitality end markets and with a presence in key European geographies. With customer relations spanning decades, CED has proven to be a reliable partner to its blue-chip customer base.

Read More

Trustteam

Trustteam is a one-stop-shop IT managed services provider serving a stable base of over 6,500 active customers in Belgium and France. The Company aims to fully unburden their customers of their IT needs, and mainly targets SMEs, an attractive segment with growing IT needs. Trustteam has office locations in Belgium , France and Romania.

Read More

2Connect

2Connect is a leading European provider of interconnection solutions for critical applications in demanding industries like semiconductor, off-highway, medtech, and high-tech machine building. The company designs, produces and assembles customized cables and connectors, with a focus on high mix, low volume batches, supplying mission-critical components with a high cost of failure. With customer relations spanning decades, 2Connect has proven to be a reliable partner to the most exacting customers.

Read More

MBK Fincom

MBK is a strongly growing, pan-European e-commerce player with an innovative business model that allows to leverage its own digital brands through data-driven tools. The Company co-designs its own-brand products and makes a rigorous value-for-money product selection across a broad range of categories including home furniture, above ground pools, beach accessories, garden & patio furniture, sports & fitness and others. The product portfolio includes 29 own brands as well as a variety of third-party brands, which are distributed through both MBK’s own channel ProduceShop as well as third-party marketplaces. MBK is headquartered near Lugano, Switzerland, and is active across 24 countries, including Italy, France, Germany, Spain, Austria and Switzerland.

Read More

Agilitas Group

Agilitas Group (formerly t-groep) is an HR solutions provider focused on temporary staffing in Belgium and the Netherlands. General temporary staffing makes up c. 70% of sales with the remainder coming from staffing in the cultural sector, service vouchers and HR consulting. The Company is active through 74 offices in the Belgian market with the balance of sales being generated in the Netherlands where Agilitas operates 66 offices.

Read More

]init[ AG für digitale Kommunikation

]init[is a leading German IT services provider focusing on digitization projects in the public sector as well as in the regulated private sector. The company’s end-to-end services offering covers strategy & consulting, experience & content, platform & application development, and managed services & operations. Headquartered in Berlin, Germany, the ]init[ Group operates seven office locations across Germany, Belgium and Switzerland with more than 1,000 FTE.

Read More

TonerPartner

TonerPartner is one of Europe’s leading online retailers specialised in the marketing of ink, toner, and printer cartridges for a wide range of printers in 16 European countries. The company offers one of the broadest portfolios of original branded products, high quality white label and own branded compatible alternatives, as well as environmentally friendly recycled products. TonerPartner has a loyal and growing end customer base with more than 4 million B2B and B2C customers served in recent years.

Read More

Eichholtz

Eichholtz is a well-known design brand and wholesaler of luxury furniture collections. Eichholtz sells its collections worldwide through interior design professionals, hospitality specialists and a wide range of retailers including specialists, monobrand stores, shop-in-shop and e-tailers. Customers are offered a one-stop-shop experience with a wide range of SKUs across multiple product categories (furniture, lighting, accessories and outdoor) and with different styles. Eichholtz operates an asset light business model and is headquartered in Noordwijkerhout (NL) where it has a grand showroom and warehouse, with additional showrooms in High Point (US) and Amsterdam (NL). In addition, Eichholtz has partnerships with dozens of Eichholtz monobrand stores that are located around the world.

Read More

Ace Pharmaceuticals

Ace Pharmaceuticals (Ace) is a leading independent pharmaceutical company operating in the niche market of medical need products to satisfy the unmet demand of small patient groups. By doing this, the company makes a valuable contribution to society. Via its state-of-the-art facility, Ace carries out the development, production, and distribution of its products. In addition, Ace manufactures and distributes pharmaceutical compounded products for pharmacies.

Read More

Staedean

Staedean is a leading developer of SaaS business application software based on Microsoft ERP solutions for the manufacturing, life sciences and equipment rental verticals. It serves a global (45+ countries) and diversified (2.2k+) customer base, primarily through a network of channel partners. As an Inner Circle Partner (top 1%) for 15 years in a row, Staedean is widely recognized as a top 5 global independent software vendor (ISV) in the Microsoft ecosystem.

Read More

TAS

TAS is a leading developer of software solutions and services for a niche of the financial services sector, focusing on card management, interbank payments, capital markets and open banking (PSD2). It provides mission critical software solutions linking into the core banking platforms of c.90% of all Italian financial institutions, as well as professional services related to ongoing maintenance, new regulation, and implementations. Besides Italy, TAS has operations across Europe with a specific focus on DACH and Eastern Europe.

Read More

EDCO

EDCO is a leading and fast-growing distributor of value- and branded non-food FMCG products to a wide variety of retailers. Products and services are offered to a broad customer base (+3k customers) consisting of different archetype retailers including food discounters, discount non-food, super/hyper markets, small independents, specialists and e-commerce. Over the last years, EDCO has transformed from a family led, trading business to a value-added (multicategory) distributor with a significantly increased focus on brands and retail concepts.

Read More

TenCate Grass

TenCate Grass (“TCGrass”) is the global leader in the design, manufacture, distribution and installation of artificial turf solutions for both sports and landscaping. The Company operates a vertically integrated business model from grass yarn extrusion and backing fabrics manufacturing (“Upstream”) extending through turf manufacturing (tufting, weaving) and distribution (“Midstream”), through to end product installation and maintenance (“Downstream”), serving a globally diversified customer base at each level of the value chain, which consists of leading tufting & distribution companies, landscaping and sports installers and product end users.

Read More

Corilus

Corilus is the market leader in Belgium in integrated healthcare software and IT solutions for a wide range of medical and paramedical professionals including general practitioners, dentists, elderly homes, physiotherapists, nurses, pharmacies, etc. The Company’s software solutions aim to facilitate increased efficiency in the day-to-day administrative and clinical operations as well as collaboration across stakeholders (e.g. caretakers, hospitals). Corilus offers its solutions to over 13,000 clients, representing over 40,000 users.

Read More

XD Connects

XD Connects is a leading designer and value-added supplier of sustainable business gifts, serving over 5,000 B2B-distributors, mainly in Europe. XD Connects has two main goals: becoming a CO2 neutral company in 2030 through carbon offsetting, and more importantly continuously reducing the CO2 footprint in both its product collection and operations. Headquartered in Rijswijk, the Netherlands, XD Connects operates an inhouse printing and fulfillment center in Romania, as well as a design studio and sourcing office in Shanghai. The company markets its products through a network of sales entities globally, focusing on the European market.

Read More

TenCate Geosynthetics

TenCate Geosynthetics is the global leading manufacturer of geotextiles, with applications in civil works, infrastructure and water & environment as well as niche applications in industrial fabrics. Products are used for separation, drainage and filtration purposes, as well as erosion and shoreline protection, land reclamation and reinforcement of dikes and dams. The Company employs +1,400 FTE across 8 manufacturing facilities in North America (2 incl. HQ), Europe (3) and Asia (3). TenCate Geosynthetics was sold to Solmax in May 2021.

Read More

TenCate Advanced Armour

TenCate Advanced Armour (“TCAA”) develops and produces lightweight composites and ceramic materials for ballistic protection of personnel and vehicles, aircraft and ships in the key end-markets defence and law enforcement. Main products are tailormade spall liner and add-on armour kits for various parts of vehicles, helicopters, and airplanes as well as a wide range of high spec ballistic plates for body armour (vests, shields).

Read More

Enstall

Enstall is the global leading developer and distributor of solar panel mounting systems for both residential and commercial roofs. Its in-house R&D team develops innovative and user-friendly systems, characterized by their ease to install and reliability. Production is outsourced to third parties and products are subsequently distributed to wholesalers, EPC contractors, solar integrators or installers directly.

Read More

Muon

Muon is a global leader in mission-critical micro precision solutions functioning at the heart of end user applications in healthcare, semiconductor, digital printing and filtration. With its comprehensive portfolio of miniaturization technologies, consisting of electroforming, micromechanical and thermal processing, chemical etching and laser material processing, Muon is uniquely positioned to supply these components to the world’s most demanding, high-tech OEMs.

Read More

KINKELDER

KINKELDER is a developer, manufacturer and distributor of high-quality circular saw blades applied in industrial high-speed steel cutting processes and is the global leader in this market. KINKELDER produces blades in three locations in Europe and the US, from which it exports to over 70 countries. The company has an unmatched reputation for high quality & service and a continuous focus on innovation.

Read More

ELCEE

ELCEE is a leading supplier of customized parts and components, assembled products and standard products for a wide range of industrial markets. The company is active in the (co-)development, design, engineering and supply chain management (sourcing, stock-keeping as well as quality control and delivery) of industrial parts in four product groups: castings and forgings, plain bearings, fasteners, and lifters. ELCEE operates local offices throughout Europe in combination with technical support centers in China and Poland.

Read More

ZND

ZND is a leading manufacturer of temporary fences (panels and barriers) for construction and event markets. The Company runs a highly efficient and fully automated production process and sell to distributors and rental companies arround the globe. ZND is a market leader in the United States and various European countries with production facilities in the US (2), the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and Poland.

Read More

Storio

The merger of albelli and Photobox (completed Jan ‘22) has established the leading B2C e-commerce photo products & gifting business in Europe: Storio group. The group supplies high-quality photobooks and other related photo print products such as wall décor, cards, calendars, prints and goodies to millions of customers via highly recognized local brands and strong market positions across the Benelux, UK, France, Spain, Germany and Scandinavia as well as other European countries. Storio group operates a vertically integrated business model, combining e-commerce with inhouse printing and photo creation software, but also collaborates with networked external factories.

Read More

TenCate Advanced Composites

TenCate Advanced Composites (“TCAC”) is a leading global producer of advanced thermoplastic (TP) and thermoset (TS) composites. TCAC supplies TP composites to commercial aviation programs including Airbus and Boeing who are increasingly replacing traditional materials with TP as a means of reducing costs and enabling higher build rates on current and next-generation programs. In addition, TCAC has leading positions in high-value, attractive niche TS markets including Space & Communications and Industrial end-markets (specialty automotive). The Company employs over 700 FTE globally and operates manufacturing facilities in North America (3 incl. HQ), Europe (2), and Asia (1). TenCate Advanced Composites was sold to Toray in July 2018.

Read More

Best4Tires

Best4Tires is a digitally enabled leader in the B2B aftermarket distribution of tires, rims, completely fitted wheels and related services to car dealerships and wholesalers in Germany with a superior logistics expertise and network. Additionally, Best4Tires provides wheel assembly services to blue-chip car OEMs in Europe. Operations are based in Germany, Austria, Hungary, Slovak Republic, Sweden and the Netherlands. The group has shown consistent historical growth and is uniquely positioned in the market having a broad, deep and loyal customer base.

Read More
